article_title: Modern Healthcare Modern Healthcare business news, research, data and events
article_text: Defense contractor Lockheed Martin, Bethesda, Md., has closed on its acquisition of Systems Made Simple, a Syracuse, N.Y.-based health data analytics and health information technology services provider working with the National Institutes of Health and the Veterans Affairs Department's Veterans Health Administration.The deal is Lockheed's seventh of the year and signals its increasing move into healthcare. A Lockheed subsidiary also has been involved in HealthCare.gov Terms of the deal, announced in late October and consummated Monday, were undisclosed.Follow Joseph Conn on Twitter: @MHJConn

article_metadata.title: Lockheed closes on deal for Systems Made Simple

A Lockheed subsidiary also has been involved in HealthCare.gov Terms of the deal, announced in late October and consummated Monday, were undisclosed.Follow Joseph Conn on Twitter: @MHJConn
Defense contractor Lockheed Martin, Bethesda, Md., has closed on its acquisition of Systems Made Simple, a Syracuse, N.Y.-based health data analytics and health information technology services provider working with the National Institutes of Health and the Veterans Affairs Department's Veterans Health Administration.The deal is Lockheed's seventh of the year and signals its increasing move into healthcare.
